WorkItem.Description: In ASP.NET, I will like to have an audio player on a site to play music from a playlist. The playlist could be from a database or an XML file. Could you do a sample on how to do this please? Thanks! Marvelous work by the way!
WorkItem.Summary: Request: How to embed Media player in music store web site

Comments.Message:
Hello tomotayo 

Thank you for using our sample request service! (http://1code.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=NEW%2c%20FREE%20Code%20Sample%20Request%20Service%20from%20Microsoft%20All-In-One%20Code%20Framework) 

The code sample topic seems relevant with this MSDN blog:
Building a Web Site with ASP .NET 2.0 to Navigate Your Music Library
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/coding4fun/archive/2006/10/31/913360.aspx. 

I will ask ASP.NET engineers to evaluate your sample request today, and then update you.
